original_text: Nothing outside a person can defile them by going into them. Rather, it is what comes out of a person that defiles them.”
korean_text: 무엇이든지 밖에서 사람에게로 들어가는 것은 능히 사람을 더럽게 하지 못하되

sentences.original_text: Nothing outside a person can defile them
sentences.korean_translation: 사람 밖에 있는 것은 그를 더럽힐 수 없다

sentences.original_text: it is what comes out of a person
